column5: I know that PJ and Breezy Point have done some crazy sh*t while in Canada, but this takes the cake......"Bro"...... http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/britis...r-us-1.3739066
IF this is true - somebody better "go after them" -- It is hard to believe that there are people out there that ARE that stupid -- (OK - not really too hard).............

So what's the big deal? A beaver was pizzing me off because it kept gnawing through my fishing line so I stole the ridge pole from it's hut and lit it on fire. Beaver dam jumping was becoming a little boring anyways......... I'm surprised I wasn't blamed for spearing the beaver on top of everything else. PjBeaverFire.
Huh,...well,don't do it in my neck of the woods.May result in a flaming surf board,..
Instead of "how not to behave in a foreign country", how about just "how not to behave"? This is just another glaring example of the "look at me" syndrome we see all too often nowadays.
This invites a few jokes....like "smoke on the water"....but it's serious and it had to be illegal....why not shut down immediately?
I'm guessing that the amount of pollutant put in the lake was less than fishermans OB's and urinating. Lol! Looks pretty cool to me. Not cool enough to buy the product though.
